item.title: Taglets 2.0.3 Released.
item.description: Added inline tags {@at} and {@annotation}. Use those inline tags as embedded inline tags if you need to use an at sign or want to mark an annotation. Added meta tag for newsfeed to web pages.Moved <fileset> definitions in build file to toplevel to prevent Ant warnings about future versions that might not support this feature.

item.title: Taglets 2.0.2 Released.
Taglets 2.0.1 (Beta) Available.
item.description: Updated ant-tools to version 1.2.0.

item.title: Taglets 2.0.0 Released.
item.description: First public release of the Taglets Collection. Completed documentation for release 2. Added demos to userguide and distribution. Added to do list and known bugs information.

item.title: Taglets 1.9.2 Available.
item.description: Added new implementation of former @table tag. Added a lot of the original etaglet block tags like @todo, @info, @note, @warning and @error. Added block implementation tags @impl, @equivalence and @testcase. Revamped demo documentation. The regex application no longer serves as demo, but is still included to fiddle with regex replacements. Functionally complete for 2.0 except for documentation.

item.title: Taglets 1.9.1 Available.
item.description: Added new implementation of anonymous @constant tag. All parameter tags can now be configured to run in literal mode (escaping all HTML entities) and/or in preformatted mode (acting like the HTML pre tag). Added regular expression replacer as shutdown taglet. Added file copier as shutdown taglet. Default stylesheet and images are now part of the standard taglets configuration and are automatically added to the documentation generated.

item.title: Taglets 1.9.0 Available.
item.description: Added shutdown hooks and support for shutdown taglets. Added checkstyle report to auditing reports. The @since tag now also accepts @new when running in mandatory mode. Added further unit tests. Added wildcard file matcher to shutdown package.

item.title: Taglets 1.8.2 Available.
item.description: Added parameter to simple doclet commands to retrieve context information. Added support to recognize undefined mandatory tags. Full support for the former @since tag. Changed @note and @warning to inline tags to increase usability.

item.title: Taglets 1.8.1 Available.
item.description: Simplified checkout and configuration for use with Eclipse. Added more documentation. Added better auditing information. Adjusted copyright headers to include 2007.

item.title: Taglets 1.7.1 Available.
item.description: Revamped and simplified main taglets entry point. Include versioning information in taglets.jar. Added generated tag list of all tag tools to taglets.jar.

item.title: Taglets 1.7.0 Available.
item.description: Added support to generate tool configuration files for 3rd party tools. Added tag list for EJBGen. Added scripts to generate tag list for XDoclet.

item.title: Taglets 1.6.1 Available.
item.description: Configuration support import of other configuration files. Added unit tests to verify precendence of default and user configuration files loaded. Fixed issues related to CVS keyword expansion in default configuration.

item.title: Taglets 1.6.0 Available.
item.description: Added lots of unit tests. Updated site documentation for the next major release. Adjusted developer documentation. Added default implementations for most tags supported by Taglets-1.2.1. Except for user documentation and the former {@table} and @version tags this release is functionally complete for next major release.

item.title: Taglets 1.5.3 Available.
item.description: Adjusted documentation. Prepared a release for integration in a local project.

item.title: Taglets 1.5.2 Available.
item.description: Added various auditing tools. Revamped build process. Added demo application. Created parameter and regex filter.

item.title: Taglets 1.5.1 Available.
item.description: Added more legacy taglets. Added filter interface for simple taglets.

item.title: Taglets 1.5.0 Available.
item.description: Added implementations for various legacy taglets. Added regex-based taglet implementation.

item.title: Taglets 1.4.1 Available.
item.description: Revamped driver plug-in interface to support memory-based URLs.

item.title: Taglets 1.4.0 Available.
item.description: Core driver for J2SE 1.5.

item.title: Taglets 1.3.2 Available.
item.description: URL based plug-in interface for drivers. Core driver for J2SE 1.4.

item.title: Taglets 1.3.1 Available.
item.description: Adjusted JavaDoc driver interfaces. Use of MuliFex build scripts.

item.title: Taglets 1.3.0 Available.
item.description: Core implementation for the next major release. Complete rewrite of the initial taglets implementation. Use of BSD-style license for the rewritten implementation. Built-in support for J2SE 1.4 and J2SE 1.5 JavaDoc. Moved repository to SourceForge, as of release 1.3.0 the Taglets Collection is OpenSource, thanks to Ergon Informatik AG.

item.title: Taglets 1.2.1 Released.
item.description: Added soap, axis and struts to default properties. More robust properties parsing. Improved documentation.

item.title: Taglets 1.2.0 Released.
item.description: Added configuration file support. Added support for conigurable includes and ignores.

item.title: Taglets 1.1.2 Released.
item.description: New tag @table. Improved documentation.

item.title: Taglets 1.1.1 Released.
item.description: Bugfix, @adm tag now correctly emits mailto or warns if the emails have not been configured.

item.title: Taglets 1.1.0 Released.
item.description: New tag @adm for projects other than javalib. The tags @note and @warning now only produce icons if configured to do so.

item.title: Taglets 1.0.2 Released.
item.description: To simplify use of etaglets in projects warnings for missing @since tags are disabled by default, check out the documentation on how to enable them again.

item.title: Taglets 1.0.1 Released.
item.description: Ported etaglet-1.0 to CVS master.

item.title: Taglets 1.0.0 Released.
item.description: Initial release of the taglets collection. This release was created at Ergon Informatik AG and is not available to the public.
